profile_summary: Streaming-focused data engineer with 8+ years in IoT and telemetry data ingestion, processing, and storage systems. Experienced with Flink, Kinesis, and edge-to-cloud flows.

experience.title: Data Streaming Engineer, SensorFlow GmbH; Hamburg, Germany — 2019–Present
experience.summary: Built end-to-end streaming architecture using AWS Kinesis, Flink, and DynamoDB. Designed time-window aggregators and late-arrival handling logic.

experience.title: Big Data Engineer, IoTNet AG; Bremen, Germany — 2015–2019
experience.summary: Deployed Kafka + Spark pipelines for telemetry logs. Developed alert system for equipment failures in manufacturing lines.

experience.title: Data Engineer, EmbeddedBits UG; Kiel, Germany — 2013–2015
experience.summary: Set up MQTT brokers and wrote custom processors for lightweight device payloads using Python.
